channel.title: (: Quick Question :) [317 || Delta]
channel.description:
Well Im Sick Of Servers, However Fast You Kill Pest Control, You (Usually) Only Get 10 Points, So Im Making It So You Theres A Bonus Timer, What Im Getting At Is This:
pcPoints += "+PlayerHandler.pcInBattleTimer+";
But You See The Problem There Is That There Incompatible Types Of Codes?
Is There A Way Around This?
compiler.bat Is Telling Me That Maybe You An Int, Quite-Frankly, I've Got No Clue About Them...

item.title: (: Quick Question :) [317 || Delta]
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Well Im Sick Of Servers, However Fast You Kill Pest Control, You (Usually) Only Get 10 Points, So Im Making It So You Theres A Bonus Timer, What Im Getting At Is This:

pcPoints += “+PlayerHandler.pcInBattleTimer+”;

But You See The Problem There Is That There Incompatible Types Of Codes?

Is There A Way Around This?

compiler.bat Is Telling Me That Maybe You An Int, Quite-Frankly, I’ve Got No Clue About Them…

Read full topic
